languages.text: "Вы низвели своих собратьев до уровня механизмов. Вы любите механизмы, не так ли? И все стремитесь сделать пустым, холодным... удобным". {n}Ирлиэт морщится.{/n}
"You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in revulsion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы низвели своих собратьев до уровня механизмов. Вы любите механизмы, не так ли? И все стремитесь сделать пустым, холодным... удобным". {n}Ирлиэт морщится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to turn everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet cringes.{/n}
"You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to turn everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet cringes.{/n}
"You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet cringes.{/n}

"You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in revulsion.{/n}

languages.text: “你们把你们的族人变成了机器。你们很喜欢机器，不是吗？你们渴望把一切都变得空虚、冷漠……便利。”{n}伊莉耶特反感地抿着嘴。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in revulsion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你们把你们的族人变成了机器。你们很喜欢机器，不是吗？你们渴望把一切都变得空虚、冷漠……便利。”{n}伊莉耶特反感地抿着嘴。{/n}

languages.text: «Habéis reducido a vuestra gente a meros mecanismos. ¿Tanto os gustan los mecanismos? Queréis que todo sea frío, vacío... cómodo». {n}La cara de Yrliet es una mueca de asco.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in revulsion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Habéis reducido a vuestra gente a meros mecanismos. ¿Tanto os gustan los mecanismos? Queréis que todo sea frío, vacío... cómodo». {n}La cara de Yrliet es una mueca de asco.{/n}

languages.text: 「お前たちは同族を機械と同じレベルまで落とした。本当に機械が好きなのだな？何もかも中身がなくて冷たく…便利にしようと必死だ」{n}ユリエットは嫌悪感で口を歪ませる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in revulsion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちは同族を機械と同じレベルまで落とした。本当に機械が好きなのだな？何もかも中身がなくて冷たく…便利にしようと必死だ」{n}ユリエットは嫌悪感で口を歪ませる。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euresgleichen auf simple Mechanismen reduziert. Ihr liebt Mechanismen, nicht wahr? Ihr strebt danach, alles leer zu machen, kalt ... praktisch." {n}Yrliet verzieht angewidert den Mund.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in revulsion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euresgleichen auf simple Mechanismen reduziert. Ihr liebt Mechanismen, nicht wahr? Ihr strebt danach, alles leer zu machen, kalt ... praktisch." {n}Yrliet verzieht angewidert den Mund.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous avez réduit les vôtres à l'état de mécanismes. Vous aimez les mécanismes, n'est-ce pas ? Vous aspirez à priver toute chose de sa substance, de sa chaleur... Tout cela au service de l'efficacité, » {n}s'indigne Yrliet avant d'esquisser une moue de dégoût.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in revulsion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez réduit les vôtres à l'état de mécanismes. Vous aimez les mécanismes, n'est-ce pas ? Vous aspirez à priver toute chose de sa substance, de sa chaleur... Tout cela au service de l'efficacité, » {n}s'indigne Yrliet avant d'esquisser une moue de dégoût.{/n}

languages.text: "Hısımlarınızı mekanizma seviyesine düşürüyorsunuz. Nedir bu mekanizma sevginiz? Her şeyi boş, soğuk... Pratik hâle getirmeye çalışıyorsunuz." {n}Yrliet'in ağzı, tiksintiyle bükülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have reduced your kin to the level of mechanisms. You love mechanisms, do you not? You strive to make everything empty, cold... convenient." {n}Yrliet's mouth twists in revulsion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hısımlarınızı mekanizma seviyesine indirgiyorsunuz. Nedir bu mekanizma sevginiz? Her şeyi boş, soğuk... Pratik hâle getirmeye çalışıyorsunuz." {n}Yrliet'in ağzı, tiksintiyle bükülüyor.{/n}
